title: New Life
lyrics:
New life, new creation,
Alive or sense of wonder
The time has come to be reborn;
The kingdom is right here.

Do we know within us
The call to change our heart?
lf we do,
The Spirit is alive in us.

Do we wish to be
Made whole in living faith,
lf we do,
The Spirit is alive in us.

Is our willingness to forgive
A sign of openness
To receive the greatest
Gift of God's great love?

Do we celebrate with joy
The good news every day?
lf we do,
The Spirit is alive in us.
